All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Appointment
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Appointment class.
AppointmentController
The Appointment controller class builds and populates the Appointment> tableview.
AppointmentOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
Contact
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Contact class.
ContactOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
Country
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Country class.
CountryOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
Customer
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Customer class.
CustomerController
This controller class builds and populates the Customer tableview.
CustomerOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
Division
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Division class.
DivisionOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
JDBC
This class opens and closes connections to the SQL database.
LoginScreenController
This class validates access to the software program.
LoginScreenTypes
This class holds methods used in the LoginScreen controller.
Main
This application creates a software package that manages a SQL database used for collecting customer data and appointment schedules.
MainScreenController
This class is the user's entry point after logging into the program.
ModelInterface
This interface defines the getID and getName methods of the ModelInterface.
NewAppointmentController
This class creates new appointments and saves them to the database.
NewCustomerController
This class creates new customer and saves them to the database.
Report
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the Report class.
ReportAppointmentByContactController
This class shows a tableview of all appointments that contain the contact id that is equal to the user's selection.
ReportAppointmentByTypeController
This class creates a table to shows the shows the total count of appointments grouped by customer and type for the month that is selected.
ReportsController
This class shows the list of reports available for the user to select from.
ReportsOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
ReportsTotalCustomerController
This class shows a total number of customers in the database.
Scenemovement
This class defines movement between scenes that can be reused.
Time
This class defines multiple methods that are used to validate time requirements.
UpdateAppointmentController
This class updates appointments and saves them to the database.
UpdateCustomerController
This class update a customer and saves it to the database.
User
This class defines the variables, constructors, setters, and getters of the User class.
UserOBJ
This class holds all methods used for accessing the SQL database.
